description:
Facebook, Instagram, Reddit, Threads and X in a single app. No ads.

Features

  • Download image
  • Download fb/ig reel
  • Select text
  • Zoom
  • Remove tracking url query params

Supported SNS

  • Bluesky
  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • LinkedIn
  • Reddit
  • Threads
  • TikTok
  • Tumblr
  • VK
  • X (Twitter)

How it works

  • Wrap the SNS websites in Android webview
  • Inject code to block ads
